summary: The document is a restricted military investigation report associated with the JFK assassination system, focusing on Manuel Marti and his character reference, Juanita Reyes. It outlines unsuccessful attempts to contact Reyes in New York, noting discrepancies in her provided address and actual location, suggesting she had returned to Puerto Rico over a year prior and never lived at the given address. The document, classified as UNCLASSIFIED but released with deletions on March 7, 1995, is part of a series related to DOD-affiliated personnel incident investigations.
key_findings: The document is part of a series related to DOD-affiliated personnel incident investigations.
Attempts to contact Juanita Reyes, a character reference for Manuel Marti, were unsuccessful, revealing discrepancies in her provided address and her actual whereabouts.
The investigation suggests that Juanita Reyes had returned to Puerto Rico over a year prior and had never resided at the address provided by Manuel Marti.
The document was classified as UNCLASSIFIED but released with deletions on March 7, 1995.
